website_summaries.verdict: An affordable window film option. Raised design adds a nice texture to your window.
pros: Helps block out UV rays as well as conserving privacy
Stands out for its attractive design that's a bit different from many other options
cons: Users report it can curl at the corners after time

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Privacy Film
customer_reviews.text: It really is nice looking. I’m not experienced with window films but it came out very well. Had to redo the first pane but once you get the hang of it, not too difficult. Use lots of soapy water so it slides around easily for adjusting the fit. I purchased a cutting mat and metal ruler for this project.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Great, pretty film.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this film. It's different from contact paper film in that it is not sticky until it clings to the window. Very easy to cut to size, and goes up very easily. The holographic effect also makes these a little more unique and special than regular window film. I used the mosaic style film in our bathrooms and laundry room where I didn't feel like purchasing a rod and curtain set. I only cover the bottom portion of the window. So far, so good! No bubbling or peeling as long as you put them on tightly. Use a ruler or gift card as you go to remove bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: ag.fabozzi

customer_reviews.title: No colors.  Just filmy clear plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I am agreeing with one of the other customers who purchased this item. "Didn’t get what is photo here, got ugly milky plastic! Haven’t even bothered putting on Windows." Where are the pretty colors that the picture shows. This is just milky plastic just as the customer said. I wish that the description was more accurate because I would not have wasted my money. I am scared to purchase another item like this without first seeing it. That is one of the problems when you buy things online. I guess the price was right but sometimes you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Fan from way back

customer_reviews.title: Works great easy install
customer_reviews.text: Good window film. Looks different depending on light as it says in the description but it’s not drastic changes. If you looking for a cleaner privacy film this product works great and looks good. I put it in my kitchen as my windows just look out to the side of my neighbors house
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to apply once you hit your stride
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff but I ran into trouble following the directions. I couldn't get the brand new utility knife blade to cut through the excess. I ended up having to take it back down and cut to the exact measurements of the window. Once I figured that out, it went by really quickly and looks amazing. It has cut down on the heat from the sun in the bathrooms and I don't give the neighbors a show when I'm trying to pee and my cat decides the floor is lava and the shower curtain is the only solution.
customer_reviews.author: Ari D.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: My mind is at ease now that I get some privacy. I love how this film still allows light to come through and keeps people from seeing in the living room. It was easy to apply. Make sure you spray enough water or windex so you can move the decal in place before you apply pressure to remove the air bubbles and liquid underneath. Love this design!!
customer_reviews.author: LaineTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow Kaleidoscope!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found this on here! They charge $40 per roll at Lowe's for the same thing. It looks beautiful on my door and I'm so grateful I don't have to keep the ugly mini blind on now to have some privacy. Little bonus: when the sun shines through it leaves a beautiful rainbow kaleidoscope on the floor! I will be purchasing more for the other doors of our home also :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dinatti

customer_reviews.title: Easy install for an inexpensive privacy solution.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to replace the bubble wrap that I used for bathroom privacy. This was a simple and inexpensive solution that allowed light in for my plant. I watched a few YouTube instructional videos before tackling the project. I used supplies I had on hand and spent $3 at the dollar store for a spray bottle, baby shampoo, and a squeegee. There was some minor frustration as the top wanted to peel away before I trimmed it. I should have used a fresh blade on the box cutter. Still, the project came out looking good and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Hospital Rat

customer_reviews.title: ... could go on for days about how much I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I could go on for days about how much I love this product! I ordered two rolls to cover the bottom windows in my bedroom to allow for natural light and privacy. These really add to my bedroom, almost like a piece of art themselves. When the sun hits them right in the morning, or the moonlight in the evening, you get a spectacular rainbow shining through. I would love to try some of the different patterns they offer. Instillation was very simple, and I have not had any issues with the film bubbling, lifting, or peeling off. Would highly recommend to anyone needing privacy without losing natural light.
customer_reviews.author: squibb17

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: The backing was pretty easy to remove but I could see how it would be tough for folks with poor eyesight or less nimble fingers. Thanks to the pattern, it could not have been easier to trim to size. Also, I love that it is so easy to reposition! I was a little worried the non-adhesive style would not cling well enough and I'd constantly be rehanging it, but I have had it up for about a week now and haven't noticed the film lifting. Bonus feature: When the light hits it just right, it creates cool rainbow effects.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Nope, doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I followed instructions to the T and woke up the next day with it hanging half off of the window. Also the pretty colors will only show in direct sunlight. I will try it applying again and you do get a good supply. Also, it's EXTREMELY hard to peel off the backing. That took me longer than the application! Will update if I can get it to stay put.
customer_reviews.author: jan tetzlaff

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install. I tried using a hobby knife to trim the excess at first which did not work very well. Scissors worked better, and the square mosaic pattern makes it easy to cut straight lines. Some of the corners are starting to peel, but it's not that noticeable. Just be generous with the spray bottle when applying, and use a credit card to smooth out any bubbles. It doesn't block much light and all and is very private, both during the day and at night with the lights on. Visitors thought I changed out the glass, so I would say it looks very professional and not gaudy.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I really had the glass clean and the edges were cut nicely with a very fine razorblade
customer_reviews.text: This did not work out and bubbled up shortly after a couple of weeks. I really had the glass clean and the edges were cut nicely with a very fine razorblade.
customer_reviews.author: ggwahlers

customer_reviews.title: it looks nothing like that on the window
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are misleading, it looks nothing like that on the window, we ended up just getting Lowe’s to custom make blinds for our bathroom window.
customer_reviews.author: Hypnotic

customer_reviews.title: No No No
customer_reviews.text: I usually ignore 1 star reviews since I figure no product can be that bad. However...this stuff sucks. It is more like a vinyl cling that doesn't cling. I tried to place it last night and the ends wouldn't stay down. Then within about 5 minutes it fell. I'd like to know how others got it to work, since was an epic fail.
customer_reviews.author: CLENicolee

customer_reviews.title: Hard to apply
customer_reviews.text: This is way too small to fit the width of a normal window, so you are forced to cut it. It is very noticeable where the seam of it is. It was much harder to apply than it implies. We had to glue a couple corners because it kept peeling up.
customer_reviews.author: TJean

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Stays rolled. Will not cling to a dang thing. Followed instructions and it just fallls off. Return for refund. DO NOT ORDER THIS. GARBAGE PRODUCT IS GARBAGE
customer_reviews.author: BabbsTheCat

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t adhere. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t adhere to the clear, clean glass window at all. Even had two other people try to make it work. Quick delivery. Simple directions and the product was nice and thick, but without it adhering to the window, it’s useless. Wouldn’t recommend. And yes, I followed the manufacturer instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Not private for bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: I tried it for bathroom windows. It is blurry and works okay for daytime but when at night you can see clearly the people (and all details) standing by the window. You might not see out but they can certainly see in! It might work for you if you have a very large bathroom and will not stand by the window or if you live on a high floor of a building, otherwise it is pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago A.

customer_reviews.title: I followed instructions, it not sticking to the glass ...
customer_reviews.text: I followed instructions , it not sticking to the glass. All The edge just hang out from the glass. Trust me I had Films on my window before. this product is not working at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Did not look like the picture at all. It was all white. It made me wonder if I was sent the wrong product. I could get just a faint glimpse of color if moving the paper toward a certain direction. I wanted to screen a glass front door but it offered very little privacy if any. Standing outside the door looking in we could still see movement inside even from far away. I'm trying something else.
customer_reviews.author: ELL Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Not as private as I hoped!
customer_reviews.text: This window film was really easy to apply and looks great from the inside, however I was expecting it to be way more private than it actually is. From the inside looking out it's hard to make out any discernible shapes, however, that cannot be said from the outside looking in. After applying the window film, I hung a t-shirt in the shower and went outside to see how private was. I could clearly make out a t-shirt design, the hanger and even see the tag on the shirt. (See photos for references.)
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Decent privacy film
customer_reviews.text: I can still slightly see through the film, and make out shadow and stuff. Overall, it is a decent privacy film, serves it purpose, but it can be better in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Vo

customer_reviews.title: this product is good but the edges can hardly stick on the window
customer_reviews.text: this product is good but the edges can hardly stick on the window... the side of the film was flipping upward due to how it was packed like rolled... so it made the edge like flip up when you stick it in your window... i tried to flattened it several times with my tools but it didnt work at all...
customer_reviews.author: dennis chua

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, cuts to the size you need easily....about to install 😳 UPDATE: installed flawlessly. Wish it was sunny now you so could see how truly beautiful this is!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Not for privacy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mosaic, however it does NOT give privacy. Installed on second floor bathroom window. When I looked from outside, from first floor, about 15 yards away, I could clearly see in. I could even see how many fingers were being held up from outside the window.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not suited to my needs
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but this was a disappointing purchase. The box indicated that instructions were inside but they weren't! I sent an email to the seller right away asking if they could please e-mail the instructions to me; but they were never received. This roll of film was purchased to diffuse the strong sunlight that comes through a couple of near-ceiling kitchen windows (no curtains or blinds). However, we unrolled this window film enough and held it up to the window, and the sun coming through was still blindingly bright. This product was advertised as being non-UV.
customer_reviews.author: Amfan

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: This film is just way too transparent. The crazy thing is you can’t see looking out from inside but you see clear as day looking outside in. If you’re looking for privacy I would recommend looking else where.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Perez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the pictures, no color wharesover, see-through, plastic on both side, nothing to remove to reveal the clinging film. It's nothing but a piece of plastic with square designs. Was I sent the right product?
customer_reviews.author: perr

customer_reviews.title: Best idea and great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recommended window films for my bedroom window. It never occur to me to use films since I usually see ones with waterfalls or forests.... I LOVE it!! So easy to install, clean windows and use soapy water! Even had leftovers to use in my bathroom. I know its not recommended for bathroom or full privacy, but it is definitely private enough!! I love having light coming through my bathroom now .... feels so much better than having blinds down 24/7 !!!
customer_reviews.author: ♡ Z

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: So you may look at my ratings and wonder why i have it a 1 for install and adhesion but a 5 for removal? That would be because the product removes itself from your windows, you dont have to do anything! Followed all the instructions, videos, etc. Was already falling off the window before i was even finished getting it up. I thought i had it once because it was all on the window...wrong. I ran an errand and came back to the whole thing being on the floor. Not worth the time or effort for the cost. Get yourself something with adhesive - you'll thank yourself later and just remember, they make adhesive remover!
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Wont stick on bathroom glass after 1 day
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful. my two 7.5x32 inch pieces keeps falling of the glass. tried three times with no luck followed all technical advice off of YouTube and still did not hold up. Asking for a refund. BTW edges curl cant get them to stay down.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Well, they work.
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely not as nice as the promo photos look but they do the job. I was hoping for more of the opalescent effect shown in the photos, there is really barely any. They were easy to install. The bottom piece in the photos is not attached, just leaning up against the window for sizing. They do an excellent job of preventing the neighbors from seeing into my bedroom while still letting in sunlight I just wish they looked nicer. I foresee sheer curtains in my future instead of this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Very nice look
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the peeling film from my bathroom window. I installed the Rabbitgoo film according to directions. I was very careful to scrape off all the old stickiness and clean the window “squeaky clean”. It took a couple extra minutes to get the bubbles out and then trim the film, but it was worth it. The film is great, it lets in light but provides sufficient privacy and as a bonus the sunlight casts a beautiful prism effect on the walls and floor! Please be aware that the film does seem to allow for shapes and shadows to be seen from outside. For our needs I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Momofsix

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful window film
customer_reviews.text: This was used on my older garage 12 wood-pane windows (circa 1968). This particular film lets the light flow in and it adds soft color infusion. I had to cut each piece to fit the pane but that was not difficult. The adhesion was excellent. Have someone help by checking the outside of the window to ensure all the bubbles are removed (that took a few tries). I bought a second roll to do the other garage window. I just ordered another pattern off this company to do my office windows. Overall, this product won't disappoint. It's a fun project and it can be done by a senior lady or gentleman. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great; not a lot of brown color.
customer_reviews.text: The pictures of this product give the overall impression that some of the squares on the mosaic pattern are specifically a warm brown; that was not the case with the one I received. Instead, it seemed more like this was a variation of the clear version but the entirety of the plastic sheet was tinted brown. I don't mind; but I was hoping for an overall warmer mosaic appearance and instead I just have something that looks tinted. That being said it's very easy to use, cut, and remove. It works well and for the price I'm happy with what I have. I would recommend but caution that the pictures aren't completely accurate to the product. Blessings!
customer_reviews.author: A Branch

customer_reviews.title: Good for privacy?  No.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this product because it looked beautiful from the picture and I had just gotten a new house. I had initially ordered the color Brown, but when I received the package, the film was all black. I decided to use it anyway because returning things is a hassle and woke up this morning with some of the squares on the floor and the rest peeling off at the corners. For what I paid for this product, I not happy with the result at all. It was pretty easy to install, but it won't stay stuck to the windows and you can also see pretty well through it. Not really a good product for privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't always stick
customer_reviews.text: The film came tightly wrapped in a roll. When I cut it to fit my sidelight (7-1/2" width), the edges curled up and it wouldn't stick to the glass. I tried it both dry and wet, and applying heat to help it uncurl. Every time it stuck for a day or two, but then the edges would slowly come up and it would fall to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Girolamo

customer_reviews.title: but there's no way I would have felt comfortable changing. That being said
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I felt this window film did not provide as much privacy as the photos indicate. Looking out the window, I could still make out the shapes of everything on the street. My bedroom window is on the first floor facing the street, so I needed something to increase privacy. I hoped that this film plus curtains would do the trick, but there's no way I would have felt comfortable changing. That being said, other purchasers seems to disagree with me, so maybe I'm just picky. I have applied other window films before, and this one was no different-- application is pretty easy, if it a bit of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Clementine

customer_reviews.title: use the box to keep the edges from curling up at the end of installation
customer_reviews.text: I think the effect of this product is beautiful! Would go with most neutral paints on adjacent walls. It probably took me 20 or 30 minutes to finish. It would’ve happened sooner if I would’ve thought to use the box to help keep the edges from curling up at the end of installation. I’m buying more for another window! You might notice to the left of the door window that I did I had to cut a narrow section Because I chose a rule that wasn’t quite wide enough for my window but the price was right and I don’t regret it, now that I see the finished product
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for this small window in my office door. As a counselor, my office needs to afford my students privacy, yet I still want to allow light in. Being a school setting, it cannot be an item that permanently adheres to the glass - therefore, this "static" product is ideal. It is very easy to apply and remove. This was perfect and affords an beautifully subtle iridescent sheen amidst the tiny square pattern. I've received compliments on its appearance and had more than enough on the roll to share with some of my colleagues. Delivery was quick and the roll of window film was in excellent condition upon arrival. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Quartermoongirl

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for - not recommended for a hot, sunny window
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to cover a window that is above our entry and the sun beats through in the summertime. The product was easy to put on (read the customer reviews, no instructions included) but it slowly began to curl at the corners after 2 weeks. Also, when the sun shines through it, the light coming through is beautiful but magnified and blinding. I was hoping for some light blocking and got the opposite effect! I did use the remainder on a shaded bathroom window and that has held up well, no curling. Sadly, I will be removing this and replacing it with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jclee

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL FAIL.
customer_reviews.text: WHY DOES THIS HAVE SO MANY HIGH REVIEWS??? The "soapy water" technique does not hold for very long at all. This product is TERRIBLE and should be looked at for fraudulent claims. NO GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Measure then buy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the paterrn. Goes up easy but, please measure before you buy it will not do more than 1/2 of a single pannel of my standard slidding glass door. Also please note the squares are very small not as pictured they are about a centermeter by a centemeter. I only wanted half of my doors done to keep my dogs from barking at passing people so I guess it is ok.
customer_reviews.author: nancy nuzer

customer_reviews.title: Love it :)
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't hard to install, it’s just spraying it with water on one side and the spraying the window and it sticks with just that- it’s like a suction type of stick. It’s great because you can adjust it a bunch if you mess up because again- it’s no adhesive- it’s just water. The hard part is if your window is large, managing the big piece is a little pain in the a**. Overall, after smoothing it out- I love it!!! It’s so classy looking- opposed to other rainbow window films that look a bit more adolescent in my opinion. I will definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Castanza

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Affordable and better than adhesive type films!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased an adhesive type film by GILA from Lowe’s. My God, was it a nightmare. Bubbles everywhere, and though it said that it was “easily removable”, when I finally had enough after about an hour of fighting with the install and took it off, it took about 2 HOURS to remove all of the adhesive that was left behind. I ordered this product based on the great reviews, and it worked fabulously. 10 minutes to install and no bubbles! I even had enough left over to do my sidelights, and ordered more for the top of my front door. Don’t hesitate, buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Deron

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work
customer_reviews.text: Just a recommendation don’t buy. It really didn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Q.

customer_reviews.title: Nope....
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the way it looked & threw it in the garbage. The picture for the ad looks way better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pearl-shell iridescent effect
customer_reviews.text: So easy to apply, remove & reapply somewhere else. Put it up in the small window in bathroom & leftover piece on another decorative window. Wife didn't like it there so it was easy to move to another window. It works by static cling so no fear of losing adhesion over time or leaving gooey glue on glass. Colorful rainbow/prizms appear in the squares when the sun or even bathroom lights hit it. But it's not too colorful to be showy. I was afraidb it would make the windows look all pink, but the squares are so small it just looks like a pearl-shell iridescent effect. Will be buying more to cover the bottom half of our shower door.
customer_reviews.author: ABZoomAbout

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! This looks beautiful. Cutting it to fit was a little tricky, it took two people. But it’s very forgiving once you get it on the window. We peeled it off a few times before deciding it was just right. We used a soapy water bottle to wet the window and the film. The film itself is not sticky, so it’s easy to fix if it gets crooked. Once it was on we used a squeegee to push out the water. After it was perfect and all of the water and air was out from behind the film, it dried nicely and looks fantastic. It gives a perfect amount of privacy to our back patio door windows.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick to windows at all
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions, curiously on the inside of the box literally, not a separate piece of paper so be careful when opening the box not to tear into instructions. In the end had to use clear masking tape to adhere it to one window, made the huge mistake of ordering enough for more than one window. Probably would have been better off going to a brick and mortar store at least I could have returned it. Easy to remove because it does not stick, there is no kind of adhesion at all.
customer_reviews.author: No time to get to a store

customer_reviews.title: Pattern is tiny which is nice. At night the street lights look like stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Pattern is tiny which is nice. At night the street lights look like stars with shiny points, everyone likes the look, and the little squares look like prisms. Not distracting, just pretty! Daylight is total privacy. Light comes in diffused, you can see someone in front of the window but unable to determine who it is. Some heat blocking too. The only down side is it comes with no instructions. There is a clear plastic on the flat side, take this off and put vinyl on wet,soapy glass. I used squeegee from my shower, a razor blade to trim when on glass. I have large windows, so I had help getting onto window. Very easy with no big problems.
customer_reviews.author: tina hedger

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing to make these actually stick to the ...
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to make these actually stick to the window, the corners keep peeling and the directions say you are supposed to use tape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and beautiful results
customer_reviews.text: Privacy and beauty have been easily achieved. We live in an older 1950s beach cottage and this film has added beauty to my ancient windows. I love the rainbow affect the film gives and the grid pattern really helps keep your measurements accurate. We have a crazy neighbor who unfortunately shares a wall and yard with us and this film has been a game changer. I’m no longer feeling exposed opening a window for light and I feel super comfortable knowing we aren’t visible from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: A.Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great for any window. Gives automatic privacy.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these when I lived in a bottom floor apartment. The windows were large but these are easy to cut to size and to place on the window. You wet the window with a wet washcloth, then I like to wipe the smooth side of the plastic as well and viola! They do take some playing with to get straight and without bubbles but they're easy to handle. I now use them on three of my windows in a neighborhood I live in and it gives me great peace that I can leave my curtains open all day to let in light yet retain my privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gruber

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Ordered over $300 worth to do many windows. Peels off in the hot sun or extreme cold. I’m actually using double sided clear tape to get them to stick. That said, it works great at what it does. Great privacy and what else are you gonna do when you want to allow light in, but you don’t want people to look in?
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply. Perfect for allowing light in, but making it so that you can't see in or out the window. I wanted light in my apartment still, but right outside my window was the neighboring apartment that I did not want look at. (Also did't want the neighbors to see in.) A blind would cover the window, but then block the light. This was an easy solution. No adhesive, so it will be easy to remove when I move out. Also, it covers up the fact windows are dirty on the outside. This particular window is too high for me to clean without getting a latter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for "guard dogs"
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to obscure our dog's view of the outside world, without blocking out the natural light. Our house is on a corner with a ton of foot traffic on the sidewalks on both sides of said corner, with the French doors on the deck giving the dogs a perfect view of all of the passers-by. This mosaic window film coupled with a mesh privacy screen on the deck rails completely obscure view of anything beyond the deck. Dogs are sad, but quiet! Pro tip: dog hair WILL cling to the film as you're trying to install.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and easy option!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty way to frost your glass. The regular mosaic color (not the brown one) is quite colorful when the light sparkles off of it - so make sure that’s your style. It took some time to get used to for my husband. He though it was “too glittery” looking but now he likes it. It frosts glass but really just merely distorts images from afar. If you walk up to the glass and peek in, you can actually still see in pretty clearly but it’s doing it’s job as far as preventing people from EASILY seeing into our front door.
customer_reviews.author: S. Innes

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Is Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh I love this window treatment! I am so happy I took a chance and bought it! I am using it on my bathroom window where there is a lot of moisture and it has held up very well for 2 months now. I live on a busy street so I need good coverage on the window, I was tired of dealing with dirty blinds so I got this to let light in during the day (and it lets a lot of light in) but still have privacy! At night I have curtains I close. I think the one’s who had problems with applying it may have forgotten to take off the backing.
customer_reviews.author: AmyT

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not providing privacy for window
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on bathroom window to provide privacy in rental home. My wife and I walked outside at night to look in and were very disappointed to see way too much detail through the film. Surprisingly too much after having read some of the other reviews so the pattern has either changed or something but this is not the film to use for blurring a human body enough in a bathroom or bedroom window.
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Even with my wife helping me it was a chore to put this on my south facing window. The difficult part for me was getting the backing film off the film to be installed. Took several attempts with masking tape applied to the corners to get the films separated. I've used this brand in the past and never had this much of a problem. It's on a south facing window and I have my plants in front of the window and don't have to worry about them getting too much light. The plants are thriving
customer_reviews.author: Lab Rat

customer_reviews.title: It would not stick to the window!
customer_reviews.text: We had done one set of windows with another brand and everything went swimmingly and the windows looked perfect. We then attempted to film the second set of windows with this product and COULD NOT get it to stick. After attempting anything we could think of for over an hour, we gave up! It’s quite “easy to remove” because it doesn’t stick in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: annbb

customer_reviews.title: Where's the Color?
customer_reviews.text: I chose this particular film because of the beautiful multi colors of blues and greens. I intended to use it as a privacy film for my glass shower walls, thought it would give the boxy, small shower a jewel box appearance. I'm so disappointed. There is no color at all. This film is also more expensive than most privacy films, but I thought the color would justify the price, it doesn't. The pictures in the listing really misrepresents the actual look. The film is clear and boring.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRIVACY FILM
customer_reviews.text: Best Privacy Film for home use. I purchased to put on bottom windows in 2nd level of my home. Our homes are built close together in my city, this film provides an extra sense of security for me. Before using this neighbors could see straight thru my home if curtains were opened. Now we have some privacy and this film allows light to come in with a beautiful iridescent type hue from the film. I love this and cannot wait to try another film product for a large enclosed porch window. Thanks Rabitgoo & Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: See through!
customer_reviews.text: Junk! I am not sure why it has great reviews because you can literally see everything through the windows at night when lights are on. You can see out of it but it you go outside and look in, you can see everything. Definitely not for use if you are trying to not have people see inside your place.
customer_reviews.author: RoadRunner85

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, beautiful and easy!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was so simple to install! I just put it up so I can’t speak to its durability, but it is thick enough that I think it will stand the test of time. I wish I had measured my door first because I bought the wrong size, but it was easy enough to cut the product to fit the space. Had I bought the biggest of the three sizes available I would have only had to cut to length. My bad! I highly recommended this product. Now I can do laundry at night without my whole street seeing me in my jammies! ;)
customer_reviews.author: MegAnd

customer_reviews.title: Replaced Grimy Old Film
customer_reviews.text: Replaced Grimy Old Film that was on my shower window. If you're looking for privacy film on a budget and still get a design and pattern not available locally (from HD or Lowes) this is a great alternative. I've found you normally get what you pay for, but this happens to be a diamond in the rough. Good deal and I got exactly what I wanted without compromising with less than stellar looking film stocked near me. Glad I waited the two days!
customer_reviews.author: PiyoPiyo

customer_reviews.title: A little tricky to get on without bubbles, but works terrific and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I found it easy to get on the window but hard to get all the bubbles out. However, once it dried the remaining bubbles were not that noticable. The overall look is beautiful both inside and out, it obscures the view (ours was for a bathroom window) and it stays on right to the corners. Love this and would recommend again. Leftover scrpas I gave to the kids to wrap around glass cylinders and they made adorable candle holdres with it at Christmas time.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Still going old after months and three different seasons.
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Easy enough, our bathroom window has stayed for months. Applied in the summer, it is now winter and behind plastic around the window to keep any kind of draft out from around an old window. So, it’s been through hot window and cold window and still stuck! We live in a four season region. How humid summers, cold dry winters. We now have it on our entire living room window to stop our hyper English Shepard to stop hyping at the window at passers by. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Teirra Fulkerson

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. It does its job
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is easily stretched out. I mean easily. Just trying to rub out the air bubbles stretched it out. Once I finally got it on my window I feel like the colors aren’t as easily picked up as I had hoped. When a car light hits it I can really see the rainbow effect but it takes a direct light hitting it, not even little rays of sunlight make it that colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Snoflake88

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fix for privacy and a sophisticated look
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut, easy to install and looks beautiful. One thing to be mindful of is size! If you are OCD, measure your window and get the bigger size. The lines between the separate panels of vinyl I cut are marginally noticeable but I can see how it could be bothersome if you are ocd about that kind of thing. I got the smaller size because it was stupid cheap! For the price (I paid 7$), it came out amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: it works well but it is a pain to install. it's doable and a necessary part of them providing a product that can fit most windows but doesn't mean i like it! ended up not quite covering our window and cutting a piece to fit the last remaining part proved not to work, it didn't stick. You really need a lot of surface area for it to stick well.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom window is large and unfrosted so I have a white blind and fabric header. I had been keeping the blinds closed for privacy before this product was presented on sale. I bought it and installed on the lower portion of the window and now I don't need to turn the light on during the day. AND - it's pretty. Because of the pattern, cutting it to fit your window is easier than you'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil Mcguire

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but this stuff rocks. I was looking for something for a door window to let the light in but obscure the view...this is perfect. Easy to apply, read the instructions, and use soapy water. Only negative from my perspective is that it does cast some rainbows around with the sun hitting it directly...not horrible, just didn't anticipate that many
customer_reviews.author: Artissmart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this, I thought it would have a sticky adhesive to hold it to the glass. However, it’s all suctioned by water. It’s amazing!! Stupid easy to install!! I just held it up to the window, used scissors to cut my size, peel the backing, spray the window, throw it up, trim as needed and done! My only complaint would be the advertised pictures show a “diamond like” material. This has no shine to. It does not sparkle or show like the pictures. I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: RaeUpton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance of privacy & light
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this window film! We used this on the guest bathroom window. This one gives total privacy while still allowing full daylight through. Installation is super simple. Just spray plenty of soapy water on the glass and the film itself, then squeegee the air bubbles out. It looks so much better than the curtain and lets through sunlight, unlike blinds. Everyone who sees it comments on how great it looks.
customer_reviews.author: H. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Final touch in a room makeover
customer_reviews.text: We don’t have a lot of windows so didn’t want to block the light plus a portion of the triple set of tall narrow windows is behind a heavy piece of furniture making drapes problematic. This was a get solution by providing a level of privacy from the street without cutting down the light. We like the prismatic effect with exception of a short time when the sun is setting when it’s too bright but once that particular angle is passed no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cher812

customer_reviews.title: Great privacy but still lets you get sunlight during the day!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a pleasant discovery! It is super easy to install and easy to remove. It has great adhesion and gives great privacy without compromising the light during day time. I was very happy about how easy it was to put on and how it does not affect my windows permanently. I like that it can easily be removed. When the sun hits is it makes nice colorful reflections which is another cool thing about it.
customer_reviews.author: Debora B

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not ideal for privacy.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for temporary use while we're waiting for our window treatments. They're very nice looking, easy to install and reposition, and have a nice raised texture, but they're very transparent. At night, you can almost see all the way through to the other side of the house through them.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Warhol

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Easy to put up too! I bought these because I have a electric heater under my huge bay window w/double paNE windows, but I still lose the heat because the washer drops so low into single degits. This has helped keep the heat in and my electric bill a little lower. What's great about these is that I can take Them off & use them next year also. They are very durable. So far I've bought a few of them. I also bought some black out ones for my windows upstairs that keep my room cooler in the summer like 10 degrees or more cooler! Great buy. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: TinaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Ease of access ☆ broad assortment from contemporary 2 Classic & reusability☆ NO BRAINER
customer_reviews.text: First I did not rate durability because I've only had it for about 2 weeks. However I will update in a few months. The product is as advertised..simple quick & lovely outside & inside view. The only negative I have found this far is the quantity...my 2 sets of windows will need 4 × 8.99$ upon completion. Im not not an expert but $10/window seem on the pricey side. I do believe "u get what you pay for; absolutely worth every penny. Will purchase & recommend it 2 Friends Are Family thank you for doing what you say and saying what you do.Great product
customer_reviews.author: KALIFORNIA

customer_reviews.title: Measure, measure,  measure before you order
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It was really easy to install once you have the right measurement. The first one I bought, I made a mistake of just eyeballing our window - big mistake! I ordered the right size and it made the installation so much easier - less cutting! Using a privacy film lets the natural light inside our master's bathroom - plus! Not having a backup window treatment to block the sun can make the room really hot/warm in the summer (keep that in mind).
customer_reviews.author: clean me

customer_reviews.title: I love the rainbow effect it has when the sun shines ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a little tricky to put these on properly at first, definitely easier with 2 people but it is do-able with one. It gives you complete privacy without blocking out the light. I love the rainbow effect it has when the sun shines through. You cannot see anything from outside except some shadows if a light is on in the room. I have had zero issues with these falling off. And we have had them on for about 3 months. Much cheaper solution than having it professionally done or replacing the window and it really looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: The film looks cool and when the sun hits it casts a nice ...
customer_reviews.text: The film looks cool and when the sun hits it casts a nice Rainbow light throughout of the room. However, it does next to nothing for privacy. You can’t see out of the window but people can see in. Which seems to be the whole point of a privacy film.
customer_reviews.author: SO

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot in that it’s hard to make a mistake while cutting and installing it. Since the design is little squares, you just measure and cut. While installing it, use more soap and less water to make it stick. If you get it a little off kilter, just pull it back and reapply. The design is nice to. The squares are tiny, about 1/8”, and break up any light on the other side with a touch of rainbow color. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nanakitteh

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: The film doesn't really block any viewing from outside or externally to inside, you can almost view everything from outside with the privacy film on the window. It works by blocking the view from Inside, so you cant see outside. which goes against why you purchased the product. waist of money, look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and it really does block the view into your room. The grid pattern on this one is small; similar in size to graph paper. It lets a lot of light in. I used it on a door with large inset glass. The colors are subtle but really pretty. I've also used this product for the backs of aquariums. I used the one that looks like bubbles for that. You put in on the back of the tank and then a layer of paper or poster board behind it to give a solid look.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: No 3D
customer_reviews.text: There is no 3D effect. The product does not stay up and there is no way to return it after being cut to fit my window. I gave this product one star being it is required to write this review. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Not a view blocker
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this for bathroom window. It was fairly easy to apply to the glass panel. Problem was that anything you place on window sill, could be seen on outside of window. It does not do as shown in ad.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Searcy

customer_reviews.title: No more nosey neighbors
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kitchen window since I like to walk around my house and not have my neighbors see me. And I like my plants so I don’t want to close the blinds. The instructions were printed inside the box which was a little weird, but I didn’t really need them. It’s basically a giant vinyl sticker.. but I think it would have made installation easier if the plastic backing was brought down maybe a quarter inch farther than the vinyl. So you can peel it off easier. But overall I like it and took only a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: nickersonmn

customer_reviews.title: Does that what it promised
customer_reviews.text: I just put this in today. Easy to understand directions. Easy to install. I got this to put in the bathroom window since I keep hearing my neighbor's husband talking right outside the window while I'm in the bathroom in the early hours of the morning. 😳 As you can see in the pic, I can still see the outline of their side garage door through the film but once I put the blinds down no one will be able to peek through the edges of the blinds anymore! This is exactly what I wanted. I don't have enough left to do our side bedroom window that faces the door, so I will order another roll.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, gorgeous effect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We ordered the bronze to go with our decor and while it doesn’t look bronze in the daylight, it does have a soft brown hue. Great UV blocking and while you can press up against it to try to view inside, the image seen is blurred and not distinguishable. We ordered 4 to cover back doors, side lights and second story entryway window and sidelights. The dimensions listed are true.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price / Easy Setup / Overall Happy.
customer_reviews.text: First timers here trying a product out to try to dampen or at least lessen the amount of sun rays that enter our kitchen area as our front & rear sides of the house faces east & west. The product works great so far & was really easy to put up. Once placed onto the window .. it was really easy to reposition for a perfect fit. We even had enough to utilize for our front window as well. Overall very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install. Rolled up for transport so that it can't lie down on glass
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is incredibly hard to install. It is rolled up cling side out in the box, which means the edges pull away from the glass when installed. It is almost impossible to make the edges lie down on the glass as the curl of the plastic lifts the edges up. Very pretty, but I have had to stop attempting to install and lay the roll out of the floor to see if the curl will unwind with maybe a week of laying on the floor with a weight on it. If not, I will probably have to scrap installing it at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use & very forgiving !!
customer_reviews.text: There’s a bit of a learning curve cutting wise, I personally would recommend cutting it to fit rather than leaving excess because on my first window I had to keep taking it off and re cutting it but it still stuck to the window every time I placed it on ! I used warm soapy water on the window & the soft side of the film to help get rid of the bubbles easier. I didn’t have a squeegee so I just used a coaster and it worked just fine lol. Very happy with this product !!
customer_reviews.author: Leah K

customer_reviews.title: Privacy and looks good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this film for my entrance door. It gives us privacy, which is what I was looking for. I did not purchase the install kit. I used my own spray botttle with water and knife. Using knife was a bad idea , could not get the edges to cut properly and which left some gaps. I would suggest to buy the kit for proper installation. The look of the door looks good. Very few sellers have big sizes. I found this with all my requirements and placed order. And quiet happy with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Vindhya Prasad

customer_reviews.title: Not the Pictured Product
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install. Hard to trim. The product I was sent does not look like what was pictured. The squares are extremely tiny. Looks more like raindrops. I used it anyway but very unhappy with the look.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks good, tips on install
customer_reviews.text: Works well obscuring objects on the other side plus looks nice with the small tiles and rainbow sheen. Price was great too. I recommend not following the part on the instructions to leave extra length because cutting off the excess 1-2CM was fairly tricky in the corners and I ran the blade a touch wonky in spots. The material has a bit of stretch so if I could do it again I’d cut it almost exact, perhaps slightly less then the window, and be fine with easier installation and a crack of light on the edges
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps peeling from window
customer_reviews.text: The corners keep peeling away from windows; very dissatisfied with this window film. SKIP RABBITGOO brand as this is the second time I gave them a chance and wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: J & J

product_meta.title: rabbitgoo 3D Decorative Window Film, Non-Adhesive Privacy Films - Frosted Window Glass Film for Home Office, Removable Rainbow Window Tint Film, Mosaic Patterns, 17.5 x 78.7 inches
feature_bullets: Strong Sunlight Blocked, Harmful UV Rejected: Made of premium material, the glass film effectively reduces annoying glares, blocks out 84% UVA rays and 99% UVB rays, and protects your skin and furniture from getting directly exposed to sunlight; By allowing softened natural light in, it also creates a cozy atmosphere in the room for you to stay in comfortably

No Glue Hassle & Removable: The window sticker is static cling without any sticky, harmful, and chemical glues, super easy to install on Flat, Clean, and Smooth Glass Surfaces, and can be easily removed and reused for multiple times, an optimal option for home applications

Add Decoration with Minimum Work: With regular mosaic pattern, this 3D window film creates colorful visual effect when sunlight shines through after installation and brings unique decoration on your windows, a cost-effective alternative to heavy expensive curtains or blinds

Important Fact to Know: ❤The 3D window film itself does not actually have any color. However, with special 3D laser design it will show a colorful visual effect when sunlight hits the film after installation; ❤Please spray a lot of water both on the window surface and window film back during installation for effective attachment

Protected Privacy, Secured Life: The semi-private window film serves a functional purpose in adding partial privacy for your personal space by preventing people outside from seeing directly into the room and obscuring outdoor views; Protection Level is ★★★☆☆, NOT recommended for bathroom

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars8,014 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
